row.process: echo "### begin env output ###" :if &UC4RB_UNIX_VAR_NAME# <> "" echo "&UC4RB_UNIX_VAR_NAME#=$&UC4RB_UNIX_VAR_NAME#" :else env :endif echo "### end env output ###"

row.post_process:
:SET &variableName# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_UNIX.PRV.VARA.TEMP.GET_ENVIRONMENT_VARIABLE_RESULT.&$ACTIVATOR_RUNID#.&$PHYS_DATE_YYYYMMDD#" :SET &variablePath# = "" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CREATE_PASS_VALUES_VARIABLE
:set &output# = 0 :SET &hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(, , "REP", "*") :process &hnd# : set &line# = get_process_line(&hnd#) : if &line# = "### end env output ###" : set &output# = 0 : endif : if &output# = 1 : set &pos# = str_find(&line#, "=") : set &key# = mid(&line#, 1, &pos#) : if str_length(&line#) > &pos# : set &pos# = add(&pos#, 1) : set &val# = mid(&line#, &pos#) : else : set &val# = "" : endif : if &UC4RB_UNIX_VAR_NAME# <> "" : pset &UC4RB_OUT_VALUE# = &val# : else : put_var &variableName#, &key#, &val# : endif : endif : if &line# = "### begin env output ###" : set &output# = 1 : endif :endprocess :if &UC4RB_UNIX_VAR_NAME# = "" : pset &UC4RB_OUT_ENV_VARS# = &variableName# :endif
